mapper.insert: insert into collection_task_time_point_status (ctid, timeSave, timeDelay, timeCurrent, status) values (#{ctid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timesave,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{timedelay,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{timecurrent,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into collection_task_time_point_status (ctid, timeSave, timeDelay, timeCurrent, status) values (#{ctid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timesave,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{timedelay,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{timecurrent,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) on duplicate key update timeCurrent = #{timecurrent,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

insert into collection_task_time_point_status
ctid,
timeSave,
timeDelay,
timeCurrent,
status,
